title: Ingame store charges my ip but doesn't unlock the champion I wanted
body:
I wanted to unlock Warwick since his rework will be available soon, but the ingame store charged me the 450 ip (twice...) but Warwick's still locked on my account.

This is on the classic client.

replies.body:
Thanks for providing lots of details of what you're seeing. After taking a quick look at your account, there's definitely something wrong happening here. Shoot us a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll have an account specialist work with you to sort this out.

If you have any questions or run into any issues with submitting your ticket, let me know.
